draft-projects.name: Weather app
draft-projects.description: A responsive weather app that displays current conditions and a 4-day forecast based on real-time data from a selected city. Built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

draft-projects.name: Legacy Lock
draft-projects.description: Legacy Lock is a team-developed virtual time capsule app that lets users store messages and media to be unlocked in the future, with secure authentication ensuring only authorized access.
